title: VFNMSUB132SS/VFNMSUB213SS/VFNMSUB231SS â€” Fused Negative Multiply-Subtract of Scalar Single-Precision Floating-Point Values

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`VFNMSUB132SS xmm1, xmm2, xmm3/m32`
`VFNMSUB213SS xmm1, xmm2, xmm3/m32`
`VFNMSUB231SS xmm1, xmm2, xmm3/m32`
`VFNMSUB132SS xmm1 {k1}{z}, xmm2, xmm3/m32{er}`
`VFNMSUB213SS xmm1 {k1}{z}, xmm2, xmm3/m32{er}`
`VFNMSUB231SS xmm1 {k1}{z}, xmm2, xmm3/m32{er}`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: VFNMSUB132SS: Multiplies the low packed single-precision floating-point value from the first source operand to the low packed single-precision floating-point value in the third source operand. From negated infinite precision intermediate result, the low single-precision floating-point value in the second source operand, performs rounding and stores the resulting packed single-precision floating-point value to the destination operand (first source operand).

fields.name: ​
fields.value: VFNMSUB213SS: Multiplies the low packed single-precision floating-point value from the second source operand to the low packed single-precision floating-point value in the first source operand. From negated infinite precision intermediate result, the low single-precision floating-point value in the third source operand, performs rounding and stores the resulting packed single-precision floating-point value to the destination operand (first source operand).

fields.name: ​
fields.value: VFNMSUB231SS: Multiplies the low packed single-precision floating-point value from the second source to the low packed single-precision floating-point value in the third source operand. From negated infinite precision intermediate result, the low single-precision floating-point value in the first source operand, performs rounding and stores the resulting packed single-precision floating-point value to the destination operand (first source operand).

fields.name: ​
fields.value: VEX.128 and EVEX encoded version: The destination operand (also first source operand) is encoded in reg_field. The second source operand is encoded in VEX.vvvv/EVEX.vvvv. The third source operand is encoded in rm_field. Bits 127:32 of the destination are unchanged. Bits MAXVL-1:128 of the destination register are zeroed.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: EVEX encoded version: The low doubleword element of the destination is updated according to the writemask.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: Compiler tools may optionally support a complementary mnemonic for each instruction mnemonic listed in the opcode/instruction column of the summary table. The behavior of the complementary mnemonic in situations involving NANs are governed by the definition of the instruction mnemonic defined in the opcode/instruction column.

fields.name: ​
fields.value:
`VFNMSUBxxxSS __m128 _mm_mask_fnmsub_round_ss(__m128 a, __mmask8 k, __m128 b, __m128 c, int r);
`

fields.name: ​
fields.value:
`VFNMSUBxxxSS __m128 _mm_maskz_fnmsub_round_ss(__mmask8 k, __m128 a, __m128 b, __m128 c, int r);
`

fields.name: ​
fields.value:
`VFNMSUBxxxSS __m128 _mm_mask3_fnmsub_round_ss(__m128 a, __m128 b, __m128 c, __mmask8 k, int r);
`
